name: Ghost Detector Tool - Free EMF EVP Paranormal Tracking Radar and ESP Communicator Equipment
name_original: Ghost Detector Tool - Free EMF EVP Paranormal Tracking Radar and ESP Communicator Equipment
description:
Ghost Detector Tool Pro is the original application designed to detect paranormal activity.

Ghost Detector Tool attempts to detect paranormal activity by making various readings on the device. Traditional paranormal equipment can be easily fooled when simple mundane bursts of normal energy occur.

Ghost Detector Pro sets itself apart by analyzing the readings and giving indications only when interesting patterns in the readings have been made.

Features:
* Energy translation to radar indicators
* Energy translation to numeric values
* Energy translation to graphics
* Word logs
* Classic Theme - FOREST TEACHER 300MHZ
* Advanced Theme - THE WILD HUNT 500MHZ
* Advanced Theme - BLOODY MARY II 600MHZ

Please note we offer no guarantees of accuracy or any warranties, therefore, since results from this application cannot be verified scientifically the app should be used for entertainment purposes.
